qas.question: What do Somalis call their ancient pyramids?
What were ancient Somali houses made out of?
Ancient Somali houses were similar to houses in what country?
What is a notable stone wall built in ancient Somalia?

context: In ancient Somalia, pyramidical structures known in Somali as <a0_0>taalo<a0_0/> were a popular <a1_0>burial<a1_0/> style, with hundreds of these dry stone monuments scattered around the country today. Houses were built of <a2_0>dressed stone<a2_0/> similar to the ones in Ancient <a3_0>Egypt<a3_0/>. There are also examples of courtyards and large stone walls enclosing settlements, such as <a4_0>the Wargaade Wall<a4_0/>.
